data: Ragusa | Spalato | Vienna | Munich | Pisa | Bologna | Lausanne
Perhaps you remember our friend Abbot Lowrich whom we met in Ragusa, in Spalato, in Vienna, in Munich, in Pisa, in Bologna, and in Lausanne.

Franciscus Columna
The Last Novella of Charles Nodier
